data.name: Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT MORE FROM OUR FRIENDS

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662050/Nobles_Life_Kingdom_Reborn/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1506680/Horror_Tycoon/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1477700/Project_Wunderwaffe/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/

OVERVIEW


Roman Triumph is a survival city-builder / colony-sim inspired by classics such as 'Banished' and 'Kingdoms and Castles'. Set in roman times, you must lead your people, build a city from the ground up and fortify it with walls, ballistas, archer towers and other defenses to survive against the ferocious Hydra, Minotaur, Cerberus, the hordes of Barbarians, the almighty roman Gods and other mythological beasts.

CREATING AN EMPIRE


In order for your city to strive, you must keep your citizens fed, safe, healthy ,and most importantly, happy. Strategically designing your city in this randomly generated world will improve your empire's chance to attract new citizens (overall city attractiveness and happiness), increase your resource and food production efficiency, ameliorate your relationships with the various gods, and maximize safety during attacks.

FORTIFICATION AND ATTACKS


Throughout the years, your settlement will get attacked by increasingly dangerous enemies. Mythological beasts such as the Hydra, Cerberus, Minotaur and some flying ones will be interested in destroying your empire as your bustling city starts to disturb their habitats.
Barbarian armies from the North will also attempt to invade and pillage your land.

You must build walls, towers, ballistas and other types of defenses to eliminate this threat. Train an army of legionnaires which will assist your long range defenses.

Progress through the tech tree to unlock increasingly powerful defense technology.

RESEARCHING TECHNOLOGY

Every civilization starts with the basics. But as your city evolves, you will be able to discover new technologies enabling you to build new structures (production, weaponry, religion, housing etc...)

THE GODS


Don't forget to give offerings to the gods, build temples, and comply with their rules or they can quickly become hostile and ruin your crops, send devastating lightning blasts, infect citizens with deadly diseases…

FEATURES

Trade, hunt, gather, build crop and animal farms, create resource production lines, establish order, provide healthcare, offer entertainment and much, much more!
  • Manage your people's food needs by growing crops and raising animals.
  • Gather resources to build more housing, industry buildings, social and religious structures.
  • Keep your people productive by satisfying their needs.
  • Religion system with temples, offerings, with gods such as Jupiter that will throw lightings at your city if angered.
  • More than 50 unique roman buildings (hospitium, insula, senat...)
  • Trading with other cities for resources.
  • Various mythical roman creatures like the Hydra and the Minotaur.
  • Build defenses and train legionnaires to defend your city against barbarians and mythical creatures.
  • Procedurally generated, realistic landscape/map with animals and gorgeous nature.

data.short_description: In this roman strategy city-builder, you must build a striving city from the ground up, manage resources and people and survive against a plethora of threats (Gods, Hydra, Minotaur, Barbarians and more)!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 2GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 560, Geforce GTX 1050)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
